Name: Spike Mtn
About the game: Spike Mtn is a challenging 2D precision platformer with fast and fun movement. To overcome the challenges on Spike Mtn, you will need to swing back and forth on your grappling hooks, building momentum to launch yourself great distances with speed. Mastering movement will give you the speed and precision you need to climb Spike Mtn! Features include: over 50 challenges; movement that's tough but rewarding to master; fun and colourful art; and an original soundtrack.
